title: User Settings
description: Add functionality to manage and customize user profiles.

title: Mobile Responsiveness
description: Improve layout and usability on mobile and tablet screens.

title: Multilingual Support
description: Add support for multiple popular languages to reach a wider audience.

title: Dark Mode Toggle
description: Add a toggle to switch between light and dark themes for better accessibility and personalization.

title: Search and Filter
description: Add a powerful search and filtering system to easily find specific content.

title: Progress Tracker
description: Introduce visual indicators to show progress or status of tasks and goals.

title: Data Backup & Sync
description: Enable automatic data backup and sync across devices.

title: Drag and Drop Reordering
description: Allow users to rearrange items through an intuitive drag-and-drop interface.

title: More Realistic Images
description: Replace placeholder images with visuals from actual project usage and data.

title: Progress Dashboard
description: Implement visual charts and statistics to help users track their personal progress over time.
